text.div:
CP_CRE (Tests for Enterobacter spp., E. coli, or Klebsiella spp. by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10851-4 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Presence] in Stool by Organism specific culture
    13318-1 Escherichia coli enteroinvasive identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    16832-8 Escherichia coli enterotoxic identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    16835-1 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    16836-9 Escherichia coli verotoxic identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    20789-4 Escherichia coli serotype [Identifier] in Isolate
    20811-6 Escherichia coli [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Culture FDA method

    44090-9 Escherichia coli O157:H7 [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture

    53944-5 Escherichia coli enteroinvasive [Presence] in Isolate
    53955-1 Escherichia coli O157 identified in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    6595-3 Klebsiella granulomatis [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    73961-5 Escherichia coli and Klebsiella pneumoniae and Pseudomonas aeruginosa rRNA [Identifier] by FISH in Positive blood culture
    82303-9 Escherichia coli O157 [Presence] in Stool by Culture
    85761-5 Klebsiella pneumoniae DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture

    85774-8 Klebsiella oxytoca DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture

    87322-4 Escherichia coli enterotoxigenic stb gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87370-3 Escherichia coli fasA gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87371-1 Escherichia coli fedF gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87372-9 Escherichia coli FimF41a gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87373-7 Escherichia coli K88 DNA [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87374-5 Escherichia coli K99 DNA [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    87375-2 Escherichia coli paa gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection

    87402-4 Escherichia coli aidA-I gene [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    88255-5 Enterobacter sp gyrB+metB genes [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88258-9 Escherichia coli oppA gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88263-9 Klebsiella oxytoca ompA gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88264-7 Klebsiella pneumoniae yggE gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    93395-2 Klebsiella pneumoniae DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
    93398-6 Klebsiella oxytoca DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
